name: testflight-watcher
description: testflight-watcher is a self-hosted tool that monitors TestFlight public betas and alerts when new spots are available or builds are updated, helping users catch limited beta openings automatically.
features: Beta monitoring: Monitor TestFlight public beta programs for availability and new build releases.
Instant alerts: Receive notifications immediately when beta slots open up or new builds are published.
Multiple apps: Track multiple TestFlight apps simultaneously from a single dashboard.
Automatic checking: Poll TestFlight at configurable intervals to catch openings as soon as they happen.
Notification channels: Send alerts via email, Telegram, Discord, or webhooks to your preferred platform.
Build tracking: Track version numbers and build updates to stay informed of app development progress.
Availability history: View historical data on when beta slots were available and how quickly they filled.
Custom intervals: Configure check frequency per app to balance responsiveness with API rate limits.
Status dashboard: View current status of all monitored apps in a centralized web interface.
Quiet hours: Disable notifications during specific times to avoid alerts during sleep or work hours.
Link generation: Get direct TestFlight links in notifications for immediate beta access.
Lightweight operation: Run efficiently with minimal resource usage for continuous monitoring.
